author: dblevins
msg: Patch from, Vamsavardhana Reddy OPENEJB-1091: Cause of RollbackException swallowed

Fixes the issue in Geronimo.  To fix completely in OpenEJB we still need to upgrade the Transaction Manager version and get a basic testcase.  This patch should contain most of the important bits though.  Thanks, Vamsavardhana!

author: stack
msg: HBASE-3674 Treat ChecksumException as we would a ParseException splitting logs; else we replay split on every restart -- fixup for distributed log splitting

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r1096833, turn warning C4113 "A function pointer is assigned
to another function pointer, but the formal parameter lists of the functions
do not agree. The assignment is compiled without modification." into an error
